name: Saturation
description: Simple soft-clipping saturation effect. Useful for tone-shaping or avoiding harsh digital clipping. Based on the output bus limiter used in many disting EX algorithms.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process.

parameters.name: Pre gain
parameters.description: A gain to apply before the saturation.

parameters.name: Post gain
parameters.description: A gain to apply after the saturation.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: The input (and output) bus. If 0, channel is disabled.
